message: Self-sustenance and taking control of your life is what has driven this decade. We, at Gopali Youth Welfare Society believe that everyone should be given fair opportunities. Computer Training is one of our initiatives that has improved the lives of locals in a significant manner. Here, we show an interview with one such woman who shares her experience.

"There are two powers in the world; one is the sword and the other is the pen. There is a great competition and rivalry between the two. There is a third power stronger than both, that of the women."
-Muhammad Ali Jinnah
Woman, you are at the leader. Cheers to the strength of womanhood!
Happy Womens' Day!

"There are two powers in the world; one is the sword and the other is the pen. There is a great competition and rivalry between the two. There is a third power stronger than both, that of the women."

Happy Womens' Day!

Happy Womens' Day!

Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared TISS Aesdii's post. Gopali Youth Welfare Society believes India’s progress depends on the progress of its weakest links. An esteemed empanelled partner of #TISS AESDII, it continues to bridge the development gap by making quality education accessible to children and youth in #Gopali village, #WestBengal. Their 'Nukkad Natak' (street play) against child sexual abuse performed with the support of students from IIT-Kharagpur during Republic Day celebrations 2018 received extensive media accolades https://m.jagran.com/west-bengal/khadagpur-break-the-silence-save-childhood-17425825.html. Learn more about Gopali Youth Welfare Society www.gyws.org #EndChildSexualAbuse

The Child Rights and Protection team of Gopali Youth Welfare Society (GYWS)  will perform a "Nukkad Natak" on the issue of child sexual abuse during Republic Day celebration (26/01/18) and during Spring Fest in the institute. This is for the social awareness for the most crucial issue related to children in recent past. Please do attend and make it a success.

Hoping for your presence.

As Yogdaan, the annual donation drive of Gopali Youth Welfare Society ends in two days, all those willing to contribute can fill up the Google form in case your room has not been covered.

You can also donate us through online transfer. The account details are available on our website. Send us a mail mentioning transaction details, your name, hall, room number and contact number and our members will contact you and give you the receipt.

Contact:
Prerit Jain (preritjain1234@gmail.com)
Prashanthi Silla (prashanthi.silla@gmail.com )

Keep spreading smiles!!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfTe2KLWcsnMYTqbjov5orOEJIEChPSEUT_dxuCxdeC8faeGw/viewform

"Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love."
Your donation goes a long way in improving infrastructure at Jagriti Vidya Mandir, an English Medium School run by GYWS.
 Join us in our annual donation drive - Yogdaan and make a difference :) 

Design Credits: Ishan Ranga

Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's photo. LiGHT (Living in Greater Horizons Together) aims its activities around achieving 8 broad objectives which are in turn a part of the UN SDG Action Campaign and Coalition of Leaders for Sustainable Development. #LiGHT #L8 #objectives #vision #un #sdg

message: Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's photo. "Awareness leads to responsibility." Hence, in order to solve a problem, we first need to be conscious of it. Under our objective of Social Awareness, we wish to utilize all available platforms and explore innovative methods to highlight the social issues. This would pacify our action plan of developing accessible solutions. #LIGHT #L8 #Objectives #SocialAwareness #CHANGE

message: Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's photo. Women are the mirrors of society! Guaranteeing the rights of women and giving them opportunities to reach their full potential is critical not only for attaining gender equality, but also for meeting a wide range of international development goals. Hence our third objective is women empowerment. #objective #womenempowerment

message:
Children are the future, nurture them right, so that they grow up to be able leaders, and lead the world toward Light!
Happy Children's Day!

Children are the future, nurture them right, so that they grow up to be able leaders, and lead the world toward Light!
Happy Children's Day!

Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's post. LIGHT takes pleasure to announce the list of colleges where our centers are about to be opened by New Year 2018. The institutes are as follows: 1. NIT Warangal 2. National Institute of Technology Calicut 3. Sagar Group of Institutions (SISTec), Bhopal We are very glad to welcome these prestigious institutions into the LIGHT family! There are a lot of other IITs, NITs and IIITs in the final step of agreement and we look forward to help any college that has an intention to be a part of this noble mission.
story: Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's post.

message: Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's post. LIGHT takes pleasure to announce the list of colleges where our centers are about to be opened by New Year 2018. The institutes are as follows: 1. NIT Warangal 2. National Institute of Technology Calicut 3. Sagar Group of Institutions (SISTec), Bhopal We are very glad to welcome these prestigious institutions into the LIGHT family! There are a lot of other IITs, NITs and IIITs in the final step of agreement and we look forward to help any college that has an intention to be a part of this noble mission.

message:
On the occasion of Sports Day, the team of Gopali Youth Welfare Society along with teachers of Jagriti Vidya Mandir conducted different sports events in school in order to promote the importance of sports in Education and Fitness. The events definitely helped in the overall development of the students in an enthusiastic and entertaining manner. 
#gyws #jvm #education #sports #fitness

message:
We spread light in the world to drive away the darkness.
GYWS wishes everyone a Happy and Safe Diwali!

#Diwali

We spread light in the world to drive away the darkness.
GYWS wishes everyone a Happy and Safe Diwali!

#Diwali
Creativity in education is as important as literacy because this creativity of today can bring great innovation in tomorrow's world!
Creativity in education is as important as literacy because this creativity of today can bring great innovation in tomorrow's world!
Let us follow the path of truth and wisdom and pay homage to our Father of Nation this day!
